name: silverbullet
description: SilverBullet is a self-hosted, file-based personal knowledge base and note-taking tool. It uses Markdown, plugins, and a web UI to provide a wiki-like experience on top of local or synced files.
features: File-based storage: Stores notes as plain Markdown files for portability and version control.
Wiki-style linking: Creates bidirectional links between notes with [[wiki-link]] syntax.
Plugin system: Extends functionality with JavaScript plugins for custom features.
Live preview: Edits Markdown with instant rendering and syntax highlighting.
Full-text search: Finds content across all notes with fast indexed search.
Templates: Creates reusable note templates for consistent structure.
Task management: Tracks todos and tasks with checkbox syntax and queries.
Mobile responsive: Access and edit notes from smartphones and tablets.
Sync support: Works with file sync services like Syncthing or Git for multi-device access.
Query language: Filters and displays note data with powerful query syntax.
Code blocks: Supports syntax highlighting for dozens of programming languages.
Offline capable: Functions as a progressive web app with offline editing support.
